name: lists-teams-decluttering
title: Lists information on decluttering teams
shortDescription: Lists all the teams to provide insights
longDescription: Get insights about the teams in your tenant. Please keep in mind that you see only the teams that you have access to. For a full overview and a complete decluttering experience, the calling user has to be admin rights in SPO and Teams.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
